```{r echo=FALSE, error=FALSE, results='hide'}
year <- 2014
```


**Remember:**
Beginning inventory + Purchases - Cost of Goods Sold = Ending inventory

Beginning inventory of 2015 = Ending inventory of 2014

***

**Question:**
The ending inventory for the year ended December 31, `r year`, is understated. How will this erros affect the net income for 2014 and 2015?

1. 2014 overstated; 2015 understated

2. 2014 overstated; 2015 no effect

3. 2014 overstated; 2015 no effect

4. 2014 understated; 2015 overstated

***

**Solution:**
Point 4.
